lines.gurmukhi: rcnw cirqR icqR ibsm bicqRpn; kwhU so n koaU kIny eyk hI Anyk hY [

Unknown.translation: Miracle of His creation is wondrous and astonishing. No human being has been created like another. Yet His light prevails in all.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: rcnw isRStI mwqR dw cilqR supny smwn pRgt ho ky jIkUM icqR kwr swkwr Bwv ivKy ho psrdw hY Aqy ies dI ivicqRqw Anyk rMgwˆ ivKy nwnw Bwv Dwr ky AYauˆ swmrq`K pRqIq hoieAw krdI hY, ijs qoˆ ieh bwq AnBau ivKy spSt jwpÎw krdI hY ik kwhUM so n koaU kIny iksy hors vsqU qoˆ kuC nhIˆ ricAw igAw qy iek Awp mwqR qoˆ hI rcnw kridAwˆ isrjn hwr ny Anykwˆ rUp Awpxy ivcoˆ pRgt kr id`qy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: inpt kpt Gt Gt nt vt nt; gupq pRgt Atpt jwvdyk hY [

Unknown.translation: This world is an illusion. But every creation that is part of this entangled illusion, He, Himself is causing these wondrous acts both conspicuously and latently like a juggler.

lines.gurmukhi: idRsit sI idRsit n drsn so drsu; bcn so bcn n suriq smyk hY [

Unknown.translation: In this creation, no one looks alike, talks alike, thinks alike or sees alike. No one's wisdom is the same.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ingHw vrgI ingHw Xw q`knI iek dUey dI nhIˆ, AYsw hI ingHw Xw nyqRwˆ ivc AOxhwry drSn = rUpvwn pdwrQwˆ vrgy drs dyKn jog pdwrQ BI smwn nhIˆ, Bwv sUrqwˆ BI Awpo ivc nhIˆ imldIAwˆ[ bolI vrgI bolI nhIˆ iek dUey dI qy ievyˆ hI sunwvt vrgI sunwvt nhIˆ au\ smyk hY smqw ivc ieko hI vsqU qws rhI hY[ ArQwq bxOt dw FMg ieko ijhw idsidAwˆ BI ieauˆ sB ivc eykqw vrqdy hoXwˆ, swirAwˆ dy AMdr Afrwpn Anykqw pRq`K hY[

lines.gurmukhi: rUp ryK lyK ByK nwd bwd nwnw ibiD; Agm AgwiD boD bRhm ibbyk hY [342[

Unknown.translation: Living beings are of myriad forms, fortune, posture, sound and rhythm. All this is beyond comprehension and knowledge. In fact it is beyond human capability to understand the strange and wondrous creation of the Lord. (342)
